isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR - 1992 - 1993 - COMPONENT LOCATIONS - CAT 3406 PEEC III ENGINE WIRING

svcproc.title: CAT 3406 PEEC III ENGINE WIRING
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 57, Figure 58, Figure 59, Figure 60, Figure 61, Figure 62, and Figure 63.

figure.caption: Figure 57 - CAT PEEC III Engine Wiring At RH Dash Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES
2. START MAGNETIC SWITCH A. CIRCUITS 17E & 17C B. TORQUE 48-72 IN LBS (5-8 N·m) APPLY GRAPHO GREASE WHEN ASSY IS COMPLETE C. CIRCUITS 14, 14A, 14K, 39A D. CIRCUIT 17B
6. REF: PART OF STOP, TAIL AND TURN WIRING

figure.caption: Figure 58 - CAT PEEC III Engine Wiring At LH Dash Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES

figure.caption: Figure 59 - CAT PEEC III Engine - Wiring Top View

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES
5. INTERNATIONAL 40-WAY CONNECTOR (191) CONNECTS TO CATERPILLAR 40-WAY CONNECTOR (J7). NOTE THAT J7 IS THE CATERPILLAR DESIGNATED CONNECTOR NUMBER.
6. ENGINE BRAKE HARNESS CONNECTS TO MAIN ENGINE HARNESS AT CONNECTOR (108)
7. WITH 460HP ENGINE, CIRCUITS 24E & 24D. CONNECT TO ENGINE HARNESS AT CONNECTOR (305). OTHERWISE A JUMPER IS INSTALLED IN (305).
8. CIRCUIT 77C CONNECTS TO JUMPER DIODE HARNESS AND TO A/C COMPRESSOR CLUTCH CABLE. JUMPER DIODE HARNESS ALSO GROUNDS TO COMPRESSOR MTG BOLT WITH EYE LET.
10. FAN TEMP SWITCH (169), CIRCUITS 23 & 23C. VIEW F WITHOUT AUTOMATIC FAN A. CIRCUITS 23 & 23C B. CONNECTOR (169) C. JUMPER CONNECTOR
11. CIRCUIT 24E TO FRONT ENGINE BRAKE SOLENOID
12. CIRCUIT 24D TO REAR ENGINE BRAKE SOLENOID

figure.caption: Figure 60 - CAT PEEC III Engine Wiring, Left Side

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES
2. CONNECTOR (227) CONNECTS FAN SOLENOID TO ENGINE HARNESS
3. A/C COMPRESSOR PRESSURE SWITCH (101), CIRCUITS 23C & 23D. VIEW F WITHOUT (A/C) A. CIRCUITS 23C & 23D B. CONNECTOR (101) C. JUMPER CONNECTOR
4. INTERNATIONAL 40-WAY CONNECTOR (191) CONNECTS TO CATERPILLAR 40-WAY CONNECTOR (J7). NOTE THAT J7 IS THE CATERPILLAR DESIGNATED CONNECTOR NUMBER.
8. CIRCUIT 11-GA TO J7 CAB GROUND, FIGURE 58

figure.caption: Figure 61 - CAT PEEC III Generator Wiring

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES
1. TO PREVENT SHORTING, POSITION WIRE AS SHOWN. TORQUE 55-70 IN-LBS (6.2-8.0 N·m). APPLY GRAPHO GREASE TO TERMINAL THEN POSITION BOOT OVER POSITIVE GENERATOR TERMINAL.
4. ATTACH CIRCUIT 11-GL TO GENERATOR GROUND STUD. TORQUE 5.6-6.8 IN-LBS (50-60 N·m) THEN APPLY GRAPHO GREASE.

figure.caption: Figure 62 - CAT PEEC III Starter Wiring

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES
7. TORQUE 105 FT-LBS (140 N·m) 3-PLACES NOTE: APPLY GRAPHO GREASE TO ALL COMPLETED WIRE CONNECTIONS

figure.caption: Figure 63 - CAT PEEC III Engine Wiring At Transmission

calloutgroup.callout1: NOTE: CONNECTOR NUMBERS SHOWN IN PARENTHESES
6. SPEED BUFFER 5-WAY CONNECTOR (193) CONNECTS TO MAIN ENGINE HARNESS
